# Coco Club Portfolio — Mishwa Zalavadiya

Official portfolio website for **Mishwa Zalavadiya** (Coco Club), a Surat-based freelance video editor and visual artist.

## About
Mishwa Zalavadiya is a professional freelance video editor based in Surat, Gujarat, India. As the founder of Coco Club, he specializes in high-retention Instagram Reels editing, cinematic storytelling, color grading, motion graphics, sound design, and social-first brand video production. Serving clients across Surat, Ahmedabad, Ankleshwar, Gujarat, and India.

## Services Offered
- **Instagram Reels Editing** — High-retention, hook-first short-form video editing with optimized pacing, sound design, and subtitle rhythm
- **Cinematic Video Editing** — Premium cinematic storytelling with professional color grading and film-quality visual treatment
- **Color Grading** — Professional color correction and grading using DaVinci Resolve and Adobe Premiere Pro
- **Motion Graphics** — Custom animations, kinetic typography, logo reveals, and VFX using Adobe After Effects
- **Sound Design & Audio Mixing** — Professional audio balancing, SFX layering, music sync, and rhythm-synchronized subtitles
- **YouTube Video Editing** — Long-form and Shorts editing with cuts, transitions, B-roll integration, and SEO optimization
- **TikTok Short-Form Content** — Vertical video editing with trend-aware pacing and platform-specific optimization
- **Brand Video Ads** — Conversion-focused advertisements for Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn, and e-commerce
- **E-commerce Product Videos** — Product showcases, testimonial compilations, and conversion ads

## Software & Tools
- Adobe Premiere Pro
- Adobe After Effects
- DaVinci Resolve
- Final Cut Pro

## Resolutions
- 4K Ultra HD
- 1080p Full HD
- HD (720p+)
- Vertical (9:16) and Horizontal (16:9) formats

## Service Areas
- Surat, Gujarat
- Ahmedabad, Gujarat
- Ankleshwar, Gujarat
- All of Gujarat and India
- Remote collaboration worldwide
